name: Summer Chill!
description:
The game is about a man called "Mick" who one day during summer can't stand the heat at the beach. So he decides to go and cool himself off by collecting some nice "cold" ice-cream cones.

The player must make his way through the map and collect all of the cones in-order to finish the game.

Good luck people, Mick's going to need some motivation for those cones!
